StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllCollegeViewByZipCodes]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@XmlZipCodes as XML, @FiscalYear as Int, @MarketAnalysisView bit = 0
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DocZipDocs int EXEC sp_xml_preparedocument @DocZipDocs OUTPUT, @XmlZipCodes
--get schools codes SELECT [CollegePro.leID] ,hs.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode ,hs.[RowGuid] as SchoolRowGuid ,hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName ,FiscalYear ,cp.PriorityCode AS Priority ,cp.BarronsIndex AS BarronIndex ,cp.NumMale ,cp.NumFemale ,cp.NumAfricanAmerican ,cp.NumHispanic ,cp.NumOther ,ISNULL(PercentQuali.ed,0) AS PercentQuali.ed ,ISNULL(NumQCPMale,0) AS NumQCPM ,ISNULL(NumQCPFemale,0) AS NumQCPF ,ISNULL(NumDQCPMale,0) AS NumDQCPM ,ISNULL(NumDQCPFemale,0) AS NumDQCPF ,0 AS NumAEV ,TimeToCollegeInMinutes ,DistanceToCollege INTO #SCHOOL_CODES FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].High_School hs LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp on cp.school_code = hs.school_code and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear WHERE LEFT(HS.ZIP_CODE, 5) IN(Select ZipCode from OPENXML(@DocZipDocs, '/ZipCodeList/ZipCodeData') WITH (ZipCode varchar(5)) ) AND hs.school_type <> 'HS' AND hs.DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY cp.[SCHOOL_CODE]
--begin count contracts SELECT dis.nct mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AS MarineCandidateId, CE.SCHOOL_CODE as SchoolCode, contract_begin_Date, n.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE, n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INTO #ALLCandidateInfo FROM MARINE_CANDIDATE mc inner join NWA n on n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID =mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID inner join OCS O ON O.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND O.DROP_REASON IS NULL inner join OCS_CLASS OC ON OC.CLASS_ID = O.OCS_CLASS_ID inner join CANDIDATE_EDUCATION ce ON ce.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID =mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID inner join CANDIDATE_ADDRESS ca ON ca.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID and ca.ADDRESS_TYPE = 'H' inner join GEO_LOCATION gl ON gl.CITY_CODE = ca.CITY_CODE AND gl.COUNTY_CODE = ca.COUNTY_CODE AND gl.STATE_CODE = ca.STATE_CODE inner join CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE ct ON ct.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = ca.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID and ct.TELEPHONE_TYPE ='C' INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OFC ON OFC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID Le. Outer join USMC.CandidatePoolCardInfo cp ON cp.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID Inner JOIN #SCHOOL_CODES sc ON CE.SCHOOL_CODE = sc.SchoolCode WHERE (OC.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear OR @FiscalYear = 0) AND -- retrieve only PLC and OCC candidates N.[OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE] IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H','1E')
--NON-RESERVIST MINUS DUPLICATE NWA'S FOR THE SAME CANIDATE SELECT * INTO #FilteredCandidateInfo FROM #ALLCandidateInfo ac1 WHERE OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H') AND ac1.contract_begin_Date = (SELECT MIN(contract_begin_Date) FROM #ALLCandidateInfo ac2 WHERE ac2.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H') AND ac2.MarineCandidateId = ac1.MarineCandidateId AND ac2.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = ac1.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID)
--RESERVIST MINUS DUPLICATE NWA'S FOR THE SAME CANIDATE INSERT INTO #FilteredCandidateInfo SELECT * FROM #ALLCandidateInfo ac1 WHERE OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('1E') AND ac1.contract_begin_Date = (SELECT MIN(contract_begin_Date) FROM #ALLCandidateInfo ac2 WHERE ac2.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('1E') AND ac2.MarineCandidateId = ac1.MarineCandidateId AND ac2.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = ac1.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID)
--GET NUMBER OF CONTRACTS PER SCHOOL SELECT COUNT(*) AS NumPool, SchoolCode INTO #SCHOOL_CODES_CANIDATE_CNT FROM #FilteredCandidateInfo GROUP BY SchoolCode
SELECT [CollegePro.leID] ,sc.SchoolCode ,SchoolRowGuid ,CollegeName ,FiscalYear ,Priority ,BarronIndex ,NumMale ,NumFemale ,NumAfricanAmerican ,NumHispanic ,NumOther ,PercentQuali.ed ,NumQCPM ,NumQCPF ,NumDQCPM ,NumDQCPF ,0 AS NumAEV ,ISNULL(NumPool,0)NumPool ,TimeToCollegeInMinutes ,DistanceToCollege INTO #Colleges FROM #SCHOOL_CODES sc LEFT OUTER JOIN #SCHOOL_CODES_CANIDATE_CNT pooles on pooles.SchoolCode = sc.SchoolCode
DROP TABLE #ALLCandidateInfo DROP TABLE #FilteredCandidateInfo DROP TABLE #SCHOOL_CODES
IF @MarketAnalysisView = 0 BEGIN SELECT * FROM #Colleges END ELSE BEGIN SELECT cp.SCHOOL_CODE ,cvd.NumVisitsPlanned ,cvd.ContractGoal INTO #OlderCollegePro.les1 FROM MCRISS.USMC.CollegePro.le cp INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.High_School hs on cp.school_code = hs.school_code INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] cvd ON cp.CollegePro.leID = cvd.CollegePro.leID WHERE FiscalYear IN (@FiscalYear - 3)
SELECT cp.SCHOOL_CODE ,cvd.NumVisitsPlanned ,cvd.ContractGoal INTO #OlderCollegePro.les2 FROM MCRISS.USMC.CollegePro.le cp INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.High_School hs on cp.school_code = hs.school_code INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] cvd ON cp.CollegePro.leID = cvd.CollegePro.leID WHERE FiscalYear IN (@FiscalYear - 2)
SELECT cp.SCHOOL_CODE ,cvd.NumVisitsPlanned ,cvd.ContractGoal INTO #OlderCollegePro.les3 FROM MCRISS.USMC.CollegePro.le cp INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.High_School hs on cp.school_code = hs.school_code INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] cvd ON cp.CollegePro.leID = cvd.CollegePro.leID WHERE FiscalYear IN (@FiscalYear - 1)
SELECT * ,ISNULL(cvd.NumVisitsPlanned,0) AS NumFYPlannedVisits ,ISNULL(cvd.ContractGoal,0) AS NumFYContractGoal ,ISNULL(cp1.NumVisitsPlanned,0) AS NumFYPlannedVisits1 ,ISNULL(cp1.ContractGoal,0) AS NumFYContractGoal1 ,ISNULL(cp2.NumVisitsPlanned,0) AS NumFYPlannedVisits2 ,ISNULL(cp2.ContractGoal,0) AS NumFYContractGoal2 ,ISNULL(cp3.NumVisitsPlanned,0) AS NumFYPlannedVisits3 ,ISNULL(cp3.ContractGoal,0) AS NumFYContractGoal3 FROM #Colleges c LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] cvd ON c.CollegePro.leID = cvd.CollegePro.leID LEFT OUTER JOIN #OlderCollegePro.les1 cp1 ON cp1.school_code = c.SchoolCode LEFT OUTER JOIN #OlderCollegePro.les2 cp2 ON cp2.school_code = c.SchoolCode LEFT OUTER JOIN #OlderCollegePro.les3 cp3 ON cp3.school_code = c.SchoolCode
DROP TABLE #OlderCollegePro.les1 DROP TABLE #OlderCollegePro.les2 DROP TABLE #OlderCollegePro.les3 END
DROP TABLE #Colleges
EXEC sp_xml_removedocument @DocZipDocs
SET NOCOUNT OFF
